paragraphs.text: In Redux, there’s a similar concept: smart and dumb components. The smart components are the managers. They follow a few more rules than the controller views, though:
paragraphs.name: ff31

paragraphs.text: This is one of the key ideas of Redux. The state object isn’t manipulated directly. Instead, each slice is copied and then all of the slices are combined into a new state object.
Thanks :D
paragraphs.name: f9e1
